data:item.name: FRDMRW612 in-system programming
data:item.display_title: How to use In-System Programming (ISP) on FRDM-RW612
data:item.overview: This Application Note shows you how to use theÂ In-System Programming (ISP) feature of the RW61x family to program the external flash on the RW612-FRDM board. The RW family counts with on-chip ROM containing In-System Programming capability, supporting UART, SPI, I2C and USB flash programming (store application code and data), as well as APIs for user code and In-application-programming functionality by the IAP API, via the unified memory interface or the secondary bootloader API.
